UPSAuthCut.Title: Cut
UPSAuthCut.ShortHelp: Cuts the selected products, parts, or reusable representations (shape, drawing...).
UPSAuthCut.LongHelp:
You can then select another object and choose Paste to insert the copied object under it.

You can also drag an open object to insert it under another object.

You can make representations reusable only in native apps.
UPSAuthCopy.Title: Copy
UPSAuthCopy.ShortHelp: Copies the selected products, parts, or reusable representations (shape, drawing...).
UPSAuthCopy.LongHelp:
You can then select another object and choose Paste to insert the copied object under it.

You can make representations reusable only in native apps.
UPSAuthPaste.Title: Paste
UPSAuthPaste.ShortHelp: Pastes the objects that you copied or cut under the selected object.
ActionBar_NewProductCmd.Title: New Product
ActionBar_InsertNewProductCmd.Title: Insert New Product
ActionBar_InsertNewProductCmd.ShortHelp: Creates a new product and adds it as a child to the selected objects.
ActionBar_NewPartCmd.Title: New Part
ActionBar_InsertNewPartCmd.Title: Insert New Part
ActionBar_InsertNewPartCmd.ShortHelp: Creates a part and adds it as a child to the selected objects.
ActionBar_InsertNewDrawingCmd.Title: Insert New Drawing
ActionBar_InsertNewDrawingCmd.ShortHelp: Creates a drawing and adds it as a child to the selected objects.
UPSAuthInsertProductConfiguration.Title: Insert Existing Product Configuration
UPSAuthInsertProductConfiguration.ShortH: Adds an existing product configuration inside the structure.
UPSAuthCmdInsertExistingProductOrPart.Sh: Adds an existing product or part inside the structure.
UPSAuthCmdInsertExistingDrawing.Title: Insert Existing Drawing
UPSAuthCmdInsertExistingDrawing.ShortHel: Adds an existing drawing inside the structure.
UPSAuthReorderProduct.Title: Reorder
UPSAuthReorderProduct.ShortHelp: Reorders the children of the selected assembly.
UPSAuthReplaceByExisting.Title: Replace by Existing
UPSAuthReplaceByExisting.ShortHelp: Replaces one or more objects with an existing object of the same type.
UPSAuthReplaceByRevision.Title: Replace by Revision
UPSAuthReplaceByRevision.ShortHelp:
Updates the selected products, parts, or drawings in a structure with an existing revision.

The Replace by Revision panel displays the product structure in a flat view. Except for drawings, representations are not supported.
UPSAuthReplaceByProductConfiguration.Sho: Replaces an object by an existing configured object of the same type.
UPSAuthCmdRevisionUpdate.Title: Update Revisions
UPSAuthCmdRevisionUpdate.ShortHelp: Updates a structure with an existing revision of its products, parts, or drawings.
UPSAuthUnparent.Title: Detach
UPSAuthUnparent.ShortHelp: Detaches the selected instance from the structure. Detached instances remain in the database.
UPSAuthCmdUpdateRevOnEntireStructure.Sho: Analyzes the entire structure to propose an update with the latest revision of the children in your selection. If the update is impossible, a revision creation is proposed.
UPSAuthCmdReplaceByLatestRevision.Title: Replace by Latest Revision
UPSAuthCmdReplaceByLatestRevision.ShortH: Replaces a product, part, or drawing with its latest revision (if any).
UPSAuthInsertDuplicate.Title: Insert Duplicate
UPSAuthInsertDuplicate.ShortHelp: Adds a duplicated product or part to the structure.
UPSAuthInsertDuplicate.LongHelp:
Select one or several products as parent and then, through a search, select a product or part.

This command is compatible with Change Execution (including with configuration).
UPSAuthReplaceByDuplicate.Title: Replace by Duplicate
UPSAuthReplaceByDuplicate.ShortHelp: Replaces one object or more by a duplicated object of the same type.
addNewMaterialQuantity.Title: Insert new quantity of material
addNewMaterialQuantity.ShortHelp: Creates a product with the selected material and a quantity and inserts it.
insertExistingRawMatrerialCmd.Title: Insert an existing Raw Material
insertExistingRawMatrerialCmd.ShortHelp: Inserts a raw material in the structure with a quantity.
ChangeTheQuantity.Title: Instance Quantity
ChangeTheQuantity.ShortHelp: Lists all instances of the selected reference object under the current parent. Allow to modify the quantity.
OpenEngineeringItemCmd.Title: Open
RemoveRecentCmd.Title: Remove from recents
RemoveRecentCmd.ShortHelp: Removes objects from the list of recently opened objects.
CustomizeHeaderCmd.Title: Customize Header
CustomizeHeaderCmd.ShortHelp: Lets you specify which attributes are visible in the header among available attributes defined in the Attribute Manager.
RelationsCmd.Title: Relations
RelationsCmd.ShortHelp: Opens the Relations widget and displays a graphical representation of the relationships among objects.
DefineFilter.Title: Filter
DefineFilter.ShortHelp: Filters content based on attribute and configuration filters that you select.
launchAttributesManager.Title: Attribute Manager
launchAttributesManager.ShortHelp: Lets you select the attributes to display in the table view.
FindCmd.Title: Find
FindCmd.ShortHelp: Searches objects in the product structure that contain a specific string of characters.
InformationCmd.Title: Information
InformationCmd.ShortHelp: Displays information about the selected object in different tabs in the side panel. The available tabs depend on the object that you select.
Import.Title: Create from Spreadsheet
Import.ShortHelp: Deprecated command. Initialize a product structure from a spreadsheet (limit: 300 products)
Export.Title: Export
Export.ShortHelp: Deprecated command. Exports product structure as .csv file. (limit: 10 000 instances)
Export_DataGrid.Title: Export
Export_DataGrid.ShortHelp: Exports the product structure as a .csv file.
Export_DataGrid.LongHelp:
Exports the entire loaded structure as a .csv file to your local computer. You can open this file in Microsoft Excel.

To select the columns to export, from the Tools section of the action bar, click Tree List View Options.
ReportWizardCommand.Title: Generate Report
ReportWizardCommand.ShortHelp: Generates a report of the selected product structure based on a template.
ListReportsCommand.Title: Available Reports
ListReportsCommand.ShortHelp: Lists available reports for this product.
UploadDocumentsCmd.Title: Upload Documents
UploadDocumentsCmd.ShortHelp: Create a document with uploaded files and insert it in the structure.
AddExistingDocumentsCmd.Title: Add existing Document
AddExistingDocumentsCmd.ShortHelp: Adds an existing document to the structure.
DownloadDocumentCmd.Title: Download
DetachDocumentCmd.Title: Detach
DetachDocumentCmd.ShortHelp: Remove the selected document from the structure.
EditDocumentCmd.Title: Edit
UpdateDocumentCmd.Title: Update
UndoEditDocumentCmd.Title: Cancel Edit
ExpandMenu.Title: Expand
ExpandCmd.Title: Expand
ExpandAllLevelCmd.Title: Expand All
ExpandNLevelCmd.Title: Expand N Levels
ExpandNLevelCmd.ShortHelp: Expands the product structure by the number of levels that you select.
CollapseAllCmd.Title: Collapse All
ExpandTaggerGroupCmd.Title: Expand
CollapsedViewTaggerGroup.Title: Collapsed view
TerminologyManagementCommand.Title: Manage Browsing Structure Definition
AssociateTerminologiesCommand.Title: Add to Browsing Structure
AssociateTermsCommand.Title: Add to Browsing Node
Add.Title: Add
Add.ShortHelp: Adds content to the product structure.
structureView.Title: Structure Views
structureView.ShortHelp: Selects a view to see references, structure leaves, flat structure.
groupby.Title: Group By
groupby.ShortHelp: Groups first level nodes by an attribute. You can define attributes using the Attribute Manager.
